Discuss this release with the .NET MAUI team on [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/dotnet/maui/discussions/22553)

### ASP.NET Core

- [Built-in support for OpenAPI document generation](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/9.0/preview/preview4/aspnetcore.md#built-in-support-for-openapi-document-generation)
- [Introducing `HybridCache`](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/9.0/preview/preview4/aspnetcore.md#introducing-hybridcache)
- [Developer exception page improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/9.0/preview/preview4/aspnetcore.md#developer-exception-page-improvements)
- [Added `OverscanCount` parameter to `QuickGrid`](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/9.0/preview/preview4/aspnetcore.md#added-overscancount-parameter-to-quickgrid)

Issues.Title: Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30046 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability
Issues.Body: # Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30046 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability ## Executive summary Microsoft is releasing this security advisory to provide information about a vulnerability in .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0. This advisory also provides guidance on what developers can do to update their applications to remove this vulnerability. A Vulnerability exist in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.dll where a dead-lock can occur resulting in Denial of Service. ## Discussion Discussion for this issue can be found at https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/55714 ## Mitigation factors Microsoft has not identified any mitigating factors for this vulnerability. ## Affected software * Any .NET 7.0 application running on .NET 7.0.18 or earlier. * Any .NET 8.0 application running on .NET 8.0.4 or earlier. ## Affected Packages The vulnerability affects any Microsoft .NET Core project if it uses any of affected packages versions listed below ### ASP.NET 7 Package name | Affected version | Patched version ------------ | ---------------- | ------------------------- [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-x64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-x64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-arm64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-x64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm64) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x86](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x86) | >=7.0.0, <= 7.0.18 | 7.0.19 ### ASP.NET 8 Package name | Affected version | Patched version ------------ | ---------------- | ------------------------- [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-arm64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-musl-x64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-x64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-arm64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.osx-x64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x64](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x64) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x86](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x86) | >=8.0.0, <= 8.0.4 | 8.0.5 ## Advisory FAQ ### How do I know if I am affected? If you have a runtime or SDK with a version listed, or an affected package listed in [affected software](#affected-packages) or [affected packages](#affected-software), you're exposed to the vulnerability. ### How do I fix the issue? * To fix the issue please install the latest version of .NET 8.0 or .NET 7.0 or .NET 6.0. If you have installed one or more .NET SDKs through Visual Studio, Visual Studio will prompt you to update Visual Studio, which will also update your .NET SDKs. * If you have .NET 6.0 or greater installed, you can list the versions you have installed by running the `dotnet --info` command. You will see output like the following; ``` .NET Core SDK (reflecting any global.json): Version: 8.0.200 Commit: 8473146e7d Runtime Environment: OS Name: Windows OS Version: 10.0.18363 OS Platform: Windows RID: win10-x64 Base Path: C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\6.0.300\ Host (useful for support): Version: 8.0.3 Commit: 8473146e7d .NET Core SDKs installed: 8.0.200 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk] .NET Core runtimes installed: Microsoft.AspAspNetCore.App 8.0.3 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.AspAspNetCore.App] Microsoft.AspNetCore.App 8.0.3 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.AspNetCore.App] Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App 8.0.3 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App] To install additional .NET Core runtimes or SDKs: https://aka.ms/dotnet-download ``` * If you're using .NET 8.0, you should download and install .NET 8.0.5 Runtime or .NET 8.0.105 SDK (for Visual Studio 2022 v17.8) from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/8.0. * If you're using .NET 7.0, you should download and install Runtime 7.0.19 or SDK 7.0.119 (for Visual Studio 2022 v17.4) from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/7.0. .NET 7.0 and, .NET 8.0 updates are also available from Microsoft Update. To access this either type "Check for updates" in your Windows search, or open Settings, choose Update & Security and then click Check for Updates. Once you have installed the updated runtime or SDK, restart your apps for the update to take effect. Additionally, if you've deployed [self-contained applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/deploying/#self-contained-deployments-scd) targeting any of the impacted versions, these applications are also vulnerable and must be recompiled and redeployed. ## Other Information ### Reporting Security Issues If you have found a potential security issue in .NET 8.0 or .NET 7.0 or .NET 6.0, please email details to secure@microsoft.com. Reports may qualify for the Microsoft .NET Core & .NET 5 Bounty. Details of the Microsoft .NET Bounty Program including terms and conditions are at . ### Support You can ask questions about this issue on GitHub in the .NET GitHub organization. The main repos are located at https://github.com/dotnet/runtime and https://github.com/dotnet/aspnet/. The Announcements repo (https://github.com/dotnet/Announcements) will contain this bulletin as an issue and will include a link to a discussion issue. You can ask questions in the linked discussion issue. ### Disclaimer The information provided in this advisory is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. Microsoft disclaims all warranties, either express or implied, including the warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. In no event shall Microsoft Corporation or its suppliers be liable for any damages whatsoever including direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, loss of business profits or special damages, even if Microsoft Corporation or its suppliers have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Some states do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages so the foregoing limitation may not apply. ### External Links [CVE-2024-30046]( https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2024-30046) ### Revisions V1.0 (May 14, 2024): Advisory published. _Version 1.0_ _Last Updated 2024-05-14_

Issues.Title: Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability
Issues.Body: # Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability ## Executive summary Microsoft is releasing this security advisory to provide information about a vulnerability in .NET. This advisory also provides guidance on what developers can do to update their applications to remove this vulnerability. A Remote Code Execution vulnerability exists in .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 where a stack buffer overrun occurs in .NET Double Parse routine. ## Discussion Discussion for this issue can be found at https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/102206 ## Mitigation factors Microsoft has not identified any mitigating factors for this vulnerability. ## Affected software * Any .NET 7.0 application running on .NET 7.0.18 or earlier. * Any .NET 8.0 application running on .NET 8.0.4 or earlier. ## Affected Packages The vulnerability affects any Microsoft .NET Core project if it uses any of affected packages versions listed below ### .NET 7 Package name | Affected version | Patched version ------------ | ---------------- | ------------------------- Issues.Title: .NET May 2024 Updates
Issues.Body:
Microsoft released the following [.NET Updates in May 2024](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-and-dotnet-framework-may-2024-servicing-updates/).

.NET Releases

.NET May 28 2024 Updates

**Known Issue with .NET May 14 2024 update** **_Symptom_** WiX toolset signed with incorrect certificate The .NET 8.0.5, .NET 7.0.19, .NET 6.0.30 release on May 14, 2024 included updates to the WiX toolset which were incorrectly signed. This caused failures in scenarios on Windows where Code Integrity checks were enabled. * [.NET 8.0.6 and .NET SDK 8.0.301](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/8.0/8.0.6/8.0.6.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/8.0)) * [.NET 7.0.20 and .NET SDK 7.0.410](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/7.0/7.0.20/7.0.20.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/7.0)) * [.NET 6.0.31 and .NET SDK 6.0.423](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/6.0/6.0.31/6.0.31.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/6.0)) ---

.NET May 14 2024 Updates

* [.NET 8.0.5 and .NET SDK 8.0.300](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/8.0/8.0.5/8.0.5.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/8.0)) * [.NET 7.0.19 and .NET SDK 7.0.409](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/7.0/7.0.19/7.0.19.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/7.0)) * [.NET 6.0.30 and .NET SDK 6.0.422](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/6.0/6.0.30/6.0.30.md) ([Download](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-core/6.0)) Note: [.NET 7.0 reaches end of support today](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-7-end-of-support/) This issue will be updated if there are any additional releases during the month.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue ".NET May 2024 Updates" (#306)
